title: 134 - Fall Football Preview
description:
A look at all the great kids, ghosts, and trees playing in our upcoming season.

Weather: "Raising Helvetica" by Sims x Air Credits x ICETEP
sims.bandcamp.com

Our 2018 / 2019 World Tour kicks off in Brooklyn next week! Don’t miss our new live show, A Spy in the Desert, coming to over 40 cities across North America, the UK, and Europe! All tickets on sale now!
http://www.welcometonightvale.com/live

New from Night Vale Presents:
Within the Wires is back for Season 3, “Dictation,” a political thriller told entirely through dictated letters and notes from a bureaucrat to his secretary. http://withinthewires.com
Our newest fiction show, Adventures in New America, premieres on September 28. Listen to the trailer and subscribe today. http://adventuresinnewamerica.com

Music: Disparition
http://disparition.info

Logo: Rob Wilson
http://robwilsonwork.com

Written by Joseph Fink & Jeffrey Cranor. Narrated by Cecil Baldwin. 
http://welcometonightvale.com

Follow us on Twitter @NightValeRadio or Facebook.

Produced by Night Vale Presents. 
http://nightvalepresents.com
